Organization Name: CALL A RIDE OF SOUTHLAKE (C.A.R.S.) | MAIN OFFICE | TRANSPORTATION
Description: Provides free, non-emergency transportation for Southlake residents only who are older adults or adults with disabilities for medical, dental, social, business, shopping and personal needs. Transportation is limited within a 25-mile radius of Southlake for medical purposes and within a 7-mile radius for other non-medical listed purposes. Clients are transported in the personal vehicles of C.A.R.S. volunteers.***Transportation only for Southlake residents

Organization Name: WISE COUNTY COMMITTEE ON AGING | OWLS ACTIVITY CENTER | OLDER ADULT SERVICES
Description: Provides home-delivered meals to homebound Older Adults and congregate meals to older adults 60 years and older as well as limited transportation. Transportation may include doctor's office, pharmacy, grocery store, etc. There is no waiting list for meals on wheels and congregate meals.

Organization Name: HOOD COUNTY SENIOR CENTER | SENIOR CENTER | OLDER ADULT SERVICES
Description: Offers on-site meals, as well as recreational activities and exercises. Services also include transportation to clients in the Granbury area for medical appointments, beauty shop or barber shop appointments and grocery store shopping.There is no waiting list for congregate meals.

Organization Name: SERVING OUR SENIORS | MAIN OFFICE | OLDER ADULT SERVICES
Description: Provides transportation to medical appointments and errands (i.e. grocery shopping, pharmacy needs, banking, etc.), minor home repairs, wheelchair ramps, yard work, and safety visits to check smoke detectors, furnace filters, lighting and look for hazards. Offers social outreach, such as a TLC Phone Friends line and Holiday Outreach.

Organization Name: WISE COUNTY COMMITTEE ON AGING | MAIN OFFICE | OLDER ADULT SERVICES
Description: Provides home-delivered meals to homebound Older Adults and congregate meals to older adults 60 years and older as well as limited transportation. Transportation may include doctor's office, pharmacy, grocery store, etc. There is no waiting list for meals on wheels and congregate meals.

Organization Name: SOMERVELL COUNTY COMMITTEE ON AGING | SENIOR CENTER | SENIOR CENTER SERVICES
Description: Provides congregate and home-delivered meals, transportation, emergency response, case management, information and referral, medical equipment/supplies lending, recreation and social opportunities for people age 60 and older. There is no wait list for home-delivered meals or congregate meals.

Organization Name: HANDITRAN | MAIN OFFICE | DEMAND RESPONSE TRANSPORTATION FOR ELDERLY AND DISABLED
Description: Provides Older Adults citizens and persons with disabilities Ride Share door-to-door, demand responsive transportation in mini-buses and taxi cabs within our prescribed service area.

Organization Name: ERATH COUNTY SENIOR CITIZENS | ERATH COUNTY SENIOR CITIZENS, INC. | MEALS ON WHEELS OF ERATH COUNTY
Description: Delivers meals to homebound elderly residents who are in need of assistance. Provides congregate meals to Older Adults 60 years and older at the Older Adults center. Other services provided include: Limited pet food assistance; In-county transportation to eligible elderly clients; Liquid nutritional supplement offered to qualified clients each month, based on physician's prescription; Friendly visitors program.There is currently no waiting list for congregate meals or meals on wheels.

Organization Name: TRINITY METRO | MAIN OFFICE | CROWLEY ZIPZONE
Description: Provides transportation to medical facilities and shopping options in the city as well as connections to four bus routes in Fort Worth, plus the South Park & Ride. Will include service to Texas Health Huguley Hospital Fort Worth South and the Gateway Station shopping center.
